TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsVolatile extends System.Object
public ref class IsVolatile abstract sealed

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsVolatile`仅在方法签名的自定义修饰符中使用, 以指示其标记的字段是可变的。`IsVolatile` is used only in custom modifiers of method signatures to indicate that the field it marks is volatile. 导入具有一个或多个标记为 volatile 的字段的元数据的任何编译器`volatile.`都必须使用前缀为的指令来访问此类字段。Any compiler that imports metadata with one or more fields marked as volatile must use instructions prefixed with `volatile.` to access such fields. 中的类仅供编译器编写器使用。The classes in are for compiler writers' use only. 编译器在元数据中发出自定义修饰符, 以更改当默认行为不合适时实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值的方式。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到自定义修饰符时, 它将按修饰符指定的方式处理值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以对方法、参数和返回值应用自定义修饰符。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符, 但可以忽略可选修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 如果C++ JIT 编译器在默认情况下将字节视为不兼容C++的方式, 则编译器可能会发出自定义修饰符来描述应如何处理字节。A C++ compiler could emit a custom modifier to describe how a byte should be treated in cases where the JIT compiler treats bytes in a manner that is not compatible with C++ by default. 可以使用以下方法之一将自定义修饰符发送到元数据中:You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用类中的方法, 例如、 、和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对`modopt`和`modreq`的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件, 并使用[Ilasm (IL 汇编程序)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)汇编文件。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
